Class ItPixelByPixelPicturesComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.AbstractTest
      • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.tools.screen.ItPixelByPixelPicturesComparator

  • public class ItPixelByPixelPicturesComparator
extends AbstractTest
    Class to use to make instrumented / unit tests with on the PixelByPixelPicturesComparator class

    13/062016

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void comparePictures()
      Tests the comparePictures() with identical pictures Two identical pictures must be considered as equal, so return true
      void comparePicturesWithBorderValues()
      Tests the comparePictures() method with border values for threshold Border values of threshold (0 and 100) must be handled without problem
      void comparePicturesWithDifferentPictures()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with different widths and heights and contents Comparison with pictures having different widths, heights and contents must return false
      void comparePicturesWithDifferentPicturesWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with different widths and heights and contents, and a threshold Comparison with pictures having different widths, heights and contents must return false
      void comparePicturesWithEmptyPictures()
      Tests the comparePictures() with empty pictures Two empty pictures must be considered as equal
      void comparePicturesWithEmptyPicturesWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with empty pictures and a threshold Two empty pictures must be considered as equal
      void comparePicturesWithNegativeThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() method with a negative threshold If a negative threshold is used, an exception is thrown
      void comparePicturesWithNotEqualHeightsPictures()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same widths but different heights Comparison with pictures having same widths but different heights must return false
      void comparePicturesWithNotEqualHeightsPicturesWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same widths but different heights, and a threshold Comparison with pictures having same widths but different heights must return false
      void comparePicturesWithNotEqualWidthsPictures()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same heights but different widths Comparison with pictures having same heights but different widths must return false
      void comparePicturesWithNotEqualWidthsPicturesWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same heights but different widths, and a threshold Comparison with pictures having same heights but different widths must return false
      void comparePicturesWithNullBasePicture()
      Tests the comparePictures() with null base picture Comparisons with null base picture must thrown an exception
      void comparePicturesWithNullBasePictureWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with null base picture and a threshold Comparisons with null base picture must thrown an exception
      void comparePicturesWithNullPickedPicture()
      Tests the comparePictures() with null picked picture Comparisons with null picked picture must thrown an exception
      void comparePicturesWithNullPickedPictureWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with null picked picture and a threshold Comparisons with null picked picture must thrown an exception
      void comparePicturesWithSameDimensionsButDifferentContents()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same widths, same heights but different contents Comparison with pictures having same widths and heights but different contents must return false
      void comparePicturesWithSameDimensionsButDifferentContentsWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with pictures with same widths, same heights but different contents, and a threshold Comparison with pictures having same widths and heights but different contents must return false
      void comparePicturesWithThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() with identical pictures and a threshold Two identical pictures must be considered as equal, so return true
      void comparePicturesWithTooBigThreshold()
      Tests the comparePictures() method with a too big threshold If a to big threshold is used, an exception is thrown

      Tests the constructor
